    • Method Detail

      • loadVertexProperties

        protected void loadVertexProperties​(int index,
                                    int offset)
        This function figures out how to add vertices with an origin at the top left
        Specified by:
        loadVertexProperties in class RenderBatch
        Parameters:
        index - index of the primitive to be loaded
        offset - offset of where the primitive should start being added to the array

      • updateBuffer

        public void updateBuffer()
        Checks if any sprite is dirty (has changed any of its properties). If so, resets its data in the data[] via load(). Calls the RenderBatch::updateBuffer method to re-upload the data if required
        Overrides:
        updateBuffer in class RenderBatch

      • addSprite

        public boolean addSprite​(SpriteRenderer sprite)
        Adds a sprite to this batch
        Parameters:
        sprite - sprite to be added
        Returns:
        if the sprite was successfully added to the batch
